title: Synce Commands
desc: Are you lost? Here you can easily access all the commands!
notfound: Out of {replace} commands, the command you are looking for was not found!

commands.name: id
descriptions: Sends the id of the user you tagged.

commands.name: afk
descriptions: You go into afk mode.

commands.name: git
descriptions: You go to the channel where the user is located.

commands.name: say
descriptions: Counts the members on the server.

commands.name: taç
descriptions: Shows the server owner.

commands.name: gel
descriptions: Brings the user to the channel.

commands.name: ping
descriptions: Sends the reaction speed of the bot.

commands.name: davet
descriptions: Sends the bot's invitation link.

commands.name: destek
descriptions: You can call our support team!

commands.name: avatar
descriptions: Sends the avatar of the user you tagged.

commands.name: kanal-id
descriptions: Sends the id of the channel you tagged.

commands.name: hakkımızda
descriptions: You can learn about the bot!

commands.name: istatistikler
descriptions: You can look at the statistics of the bot.

commands.name: yetkilerim
descriptions: It shows your authorizations.

commands.name: isim-değiştir
descriptions: You change the name of the tagged user.

commands.name: sunucu-bilgi
descriptions: Gives information about your server.

commands.name: ticket-kanal
descriptions: You set the ticket channel.

commands.name: ticket-oluştur
descriptions: You create the ticket message.

commands.name: ticket-kapat
descriptions: You close the ticket.

commands.name: ticket-sil
descriptions: You delete the ticket.

commands.name: ticket-aç
descriptions: You create a ticket.

commands.name: küfür-engel
descriptions: Activates/deactivates the profanity blocking system.

commands.name: reklam-engel
descriptions: Activates/deactivates the ad blocking system.

commands.name: everyone-engel
descriptions: Activates/deactivates the everyone blocking system.

commands.name: antiraid
descriptions: You turn protection on/off to prevent bots from attacking the server.

commands.name: bot-izni
descriptions: Allows/unallows a bot for your protected server for the antiraid command.

commands.name: rol-koruma
descriptions: Activates/deactivates the role protection system.

commands.name: kanal-koruma
descriptions: Activates the channel protection system.

commands.name: nuke
descriptions: Nukes the current channel and adds a new one.

commands.name: çekiliş
descriptions: It makes a giveaway on the channel where you use the command.

commands.name: mod-log
descriptions: Sends moderation logs to this channel.

commands.name: unban
descriptions: Unbans the user whose ID you specify from the server.

commands.name: ban
descriptions: Bans the user you tagged/ID from the server.

commands.name: sa-as
descriptions: The bot receives your greeting and responds.

commands.name: kick
descriptions: Kickes the user you tagged/ID from the server.

commands.name: sohbet
descriptions: You turn on/off sending messages to the chat.

commands.name: yavaşmod
descriptions: Sets the slowmod duration.

commands.name: mute
descriptions: Mutes the user you have tagged/ID'd.

commands.name: sil
descriptions: Deletes the amount of messages you specify.

commands.name: rol-al
descriptions: You get the role you tag from the user you tag.

commands.name: rol-ver
descriptions: You give the role you tag to the user you tag.

commands.name: sayaç
descriptions: You set the counter channel and target.

commands.name: otorol
descriptions: Gives the users coming to the server the role you tagged. Sends it to the channel you tagged.

commands.name: üye-sil
descriptions: Deletes the specified amount of messages from the member you tagged.
